commentary_sequence.speaker: Host
commentary_sequence.text: The Panthers are coming into tonight's game with a 7-3 record in their last 10, showcasing their strong play recently.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: And the Oilers aren't far behind, Host. They've gone 6-3-1 in their last 10, really finding their stride after a slow start to the season.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Host
commentary_sequence.text: It's worth noting that Florida has struggled a bit on the road this year, while Edmonton has been dominant here at Rogers Place.
